message.content:
cs.IR, cs.DL, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.CY

The paper discusses the development of a recommendation system for scientific publications based on the content of articles. This falls under the field of information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The use of algorithms for recommendations also involves machine learning (cs.LG) and deep learning (cs.DL). Additionally, the focus on adapting to new content and providing near-real time suggestions suggests a potential application in cybersecurity (cs.CY).
